column5: Staying over in Red Lake the Saturday Night prior to our Sunday Mornings Fly-out and wondering if anyone has a recomendation as to where to un-wind after a 16 hour road trip?
Try "Shelias" on the east side of the road at the north end of town. Shelia has it all and you can have a great time doing it. Tell Shelia that Smokey sent you.
Sheila's.....try the Snake Pit! Loaded with hotties there!...:)
Good pickup line for that place: "Hey, Nice tooth!"

no lie here guys but two buddies and i were up at the snake pit in may and met 4 of the best looking girls i've seen in there we went and talked to the and they were home for the summer from college. we sat and drabk a few drinks with tthem and the next day hit up red lake golf course. These gals were all 20 years old and us guys were 23 besides fishing that was the best time we had up there. oh and we went back up to meet them at norseman days last week........ nowhere to be found im starting to think that all those drinks were making us imagine things.
Were the girls wearing jeans under their skirts!?!
no and the skirts were short!
from what I recall - you want to stay clear of the snakepit -- there are no hotties and only trouble there!
